body: This is a small change to fix a reproducible problem of DHT_Bootstrap.exe being unable to read the data from the key file. Seems to be an issue with EOL. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1923)

comment_regular_data.body:
[![CLA assistant check](https://cla-assistant.io/pull/badge/signed)](https://cla-assistant.io/TokTok/c-toxcore?pullRequest=1923)
All committers have signed the CLA.
This is a fix for the Windows DHT_bootstrap build, right? 'b' there controls CR/CRLF translation while on POSIX systems it does nothing.

Might as well add "b" to all other `fopen`s in the code base, like the one in tox-bootstrapd, since the intention there is to open the file for binary read/write. While lack of "b" doesn't affect tox-bootstrapd since it's intended to run on *nix, having "b" is more correct.

I'm nitpicking here a bit, but a shorter commit message, something along the lines of "Fix fopen calls missing b mode", would be better than whatever elided essay of a commit message it currently is, and

>[F]ix a reproducible problem of DHT_Bootstrap.exe being unable to read the data from the key file. Seems to be an issue with EOL.

from the opening message in this PR could be placed into the commit message, word wraping lines to not exceed 72 characters.

Toxcore doesn't have any commit message formatting guidelines, so it's just me nitpicking, you can ignore me if you think that your commit message is fine.

> I'm nitpicking here a bit, but a shorter commit message, something along the lines of "Fix fopen calls missing b mode", would be better than whatever elided essay of a commit message it currently is, and
>

> 
> from the opening message in this PR could be placed into the commit message, word wraping lines to not exceed 72 characters.
> 
> Toxcore doesn't have any commit message formatting guidelines, so it's just me nitpicking, you can ignore me if you think that your commit message is fine.

Yes, it's long, I was not thinking straight. If you feel that I should change it then I will.

commit.message: Pass "b" for fopen to fix bugs on windows
